reviewText: I highly recommend this amazing film. This is the first in a series that will reach 18 episodes when it is finished. It is the story of a complex battle between good and evil with a great heavy metal score.  Aceifer Genovese portrays Six, a man caught up in a chess match between God and the Devil. The cast is amazing and the action is enhanced by the heavy metal original soundtrack. Gary Evans
great series ,believeable characters done classic black and white.  Cant wait to see how it ends ,expecting something really interesting
